context: Will this mouse work for just everyday computer use? Or is it Just for World of Warcraft?
response: It works as a mouse for any use. But I'd recommend a Razer Naga or another model for gaming. This mouse is just a little too expensive for what it's worth.

context: High pitched buzzing noise as soon as the Vita begins to draw energy, am I the only one experiencing this?
response: Hi, I'm not having that problem, something could be wrong with your vita or the vita "controller" Sen may need a new one. Mine works great an it feels Premium, hope I helped

context: is it in English or does it have subs i want to know but either is fine
response: The voices are in Japanese with English subtitles.

context: Noisy Typing? Keyboard looks cool, but I don't want loud clicking when I type.  Can you tell me if this is louder or quieter then your normal keyboard?  Or if it is silent like a laptop?
response: It might be a little louder than my old keyboard but it was not nearly as loud as I thought it was going to be. Here in my computer room at home I'm sure someone else in the room could hear the keys as I type but they're not what I'd call super loud.

context: does it have english audio (i.e Character phrases)
response: No it does not have English. Just some English Text like on Menus and things like that. Other than that everything is in Japanese. The game isn't hard to understand. Like not language wise but it's self explanatory.

context: This can connect to the PC as well to charge right?
response: Yes the PC will charge the device.

context: Can you use the pro controller with this game?
response: Yes. I believe that you need to start the game with the gamepad and then you can switch or have player 2 use the pro controller.

context: hi, this game is free region, can i use it in a playstation from usa? thanks
response: Yes, both the PS4 and Xbox One are region free. So the same game will work anywhere.

context: do both players on a local game need the game?
response: thank you for the good A+A+

context: Does it come with the charger? Or is it the console only?
response: The one I got came with a charger
Not that i am aware of, if it is it doesn't say, and i haven't found a program that uses it.

context: Will Elsa play on the Disney Infinity 2.0 Marvel Heroes starter pack?
response: Yes, all the infinity characters are designed to cohesively work together.  It is kind of neat to see a Marvel character and Elsa cohabitate the game, she has similar powers to Iceman from the X-men
should be able to run it on any version of windows since XP

context: Is this Legendary Edition an actual standalone version of Skyrim, or is it an add-on where I would need to buy the original game as well?
response: It is the standalone version, but you also get all the DLC that have come out for Skyrim, such as Hearthfire, Dawnguard, etc. I believe you do need a Steam account, and if you don't have one, when you install Skyrim it will probably prompt you to make one.

context: Does this work on a wii  that was bought about 6 years ago or have they since updated the wii systems and need to purchase a whole new wii system?
response: I believe you can but I wouldn't recommend this game. It is too easy to beat. This is best for younger kids. Like 4 through 6.

context: Is the middle strap elevated from the "pit" where the 3DS is placed?
response: if you mean the middle part where the two pieces of the case connects then yes it is slightly elevated from the "pit" overall i like the design except for the fact that there is no place for the built-in strap n the case except for that mid-part that ur talking about
